briefdescription.para: Backup peripheral register map base pointer.

detaileddescription.para: Enables the power and backup interface clocks, and resets the backup device.

briefdescription.para: Enable write access to the backup registers.

detaileddescription.para:
Backup interface must be initialized for subsequent register writes to work.
bkp_init()

briefdescription.para: Disable write access to the backup registers.
Read a value from given backup data register.

parameterdescription.para: Data register to read, from 1 to BKP_NR_DATA_REGS (10 on medium-density devices, 42 on high-density devices).

briefdescription.para: Write a value to given data register.

detaileddescription.para: Write access to backup registers must be enabled.

parameterdescription.para: Data register to write, from 1 to BKP_NR_DATA_REGS (10 on medium-density devices, 42 on high-density devices).
Value to write into the register.
